00021 static void ob_t3(void* par,
00022                   const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00023                   const GaussianAux* X, complex double* t3)
00024 {
00025   *t3 += (G1->xi == +1 ? 0.5 : -0.5)* X->Q;
00026 }
00027 
00028 
00029 static void ob_isospin(void* par,
00030                        const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00031                        const GaussianAux* X, complex double* t2)
00032 {
00033   *t2 += 0.75*X->Q;
00034 }
00035 
00036 
00037 static void tb_isospin(void* par,
00038                        const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00039                        const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00040                        const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00041                        complex double* t2)
00042 {       
00043   *t2 += 0.5*(((1-G1->xi*G3->xi)*(1-G2->xi*G4->xi))/4+
00044               (G1->xi*G4->xi+G2->xi*G3->xi)/2)*
00045          X13->S* X24->S* X13->R* X24->R;
00046 }

00048 
00049 void calcIsospin(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00050                  double* t2)
00051 {
00052   double isoone, isotwo;
00053   OneBodyOperator op_ob_isospin = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_isospin};
00054   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_isospin = {dim: 1, opt: 0, par: NULL, me: tb_isospin};
00055 
00056 
00057   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_isospin, &isoone);
00058   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_isospin, &isotwo);
00059 
00060   *t2 = isoone+isotwo;
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 void calcIsospinod(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00065                    const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00066                    complex double* t2)
00067 {
00068   complex double isoone, isotwo;
00069   OneBodyOperator op_ob_isospin = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_isospin};
00070   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_isospin = {dim: 1, opt: 0, par: NULL, me: tb_isospin};
00071 
00072   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_isospin, &isoone);
00073   calcSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_tb_isospin, &isotwo);
00074 
00075   *t2 = isoone+isotwo;
00076 }

00079 void calct3HF(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00080               void* mes)
00081 {
00082   OneBodyOperator op_ob_t3 = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_t3};
00083 
00084   calcSlaterDetOBHFMEs(Q, X, &op_ob_t3, mes);
00085 }
